name: Dung Dung Dungeon
description:
Note: Submitted small bug fix for game breaking bug I introduced just before submission. This is submitted 10 mins after the submission date and fixes shooting over pits which was always working except for my last commit.

Dung Dung Dungeon has you travel the depths of the insect kingdom through overgrown forests, crystal caverns and even the body of a giant dead worm!

Dodge enemy attacks as you roll up and gather dung to use as a projectile to defeat your enemies. Gather loot they drop so you can upgrade your stats, purchase items and unlock skills.

Note: Controls are shown in game and can be toggled on and off with the C key.

  • Move/UI - WASD/Arrow keys
  • Shoot/Interact - Space
  • Cancel/Back - Backspace
